name: HelpAge India
briefDescription: HelpAge India voices the concerns of Indiaâ€™s elderly. Currently there are an estimated 90 million elderly in the nation. It protects their rights, focusing on issues such as pensions, social inclusion, and health care, and enables them to live with self-fulfilment and dignity.It is a leading humanitarian & developmental organization working with and for older people in India for the more than 30 years. It advocates strongly for their cause and runs various age care programmes throughout the country to make lasting improvements in the lives of disadvantaged older persons. It also advises & facilitates the government in formation of policy related to the elderly. It was registered under the Societies Registration Act of 1860. Its mission is to work nationwide for the cause and care of disadvantaged older persons and to improve their quality of life.
